pages.title: Gems
pages.text: Gems are a combination of Stone and a Diamond, and are capable of storing the power of an element. To bind an element to a Blank Gem you can use a Binding Stone.

pages.description: The Blank Gem is made from some Stone and Lutetium.
The Fire Gem is made with a Blank Gem, Blaze Powder, a Fire Charge, Gunpowder and Coal.
The Water Gem is made with a Blank Gem, a Water Bucket, a Fish, a Fishing Rod, and Sugar Cane.
The Air Gem is made with a Blank Gem, a Feather, an Empty Bottle, String and a Bucket.
The Earth Gem is made with a Blank Gem, Crushed Dirt, Flint, an Iron Ingot and a Brick.
